aboutmetext-1: I'm Maxence Thomas, fullstack developer born and raised in Bretagne, France.
aboutmetext-2: I'm passionate about crafting seamless user experiences on the front end while designing secure, high-performance back-end systems. Full-stack development allows me to bring ideas to life from concept to production
contactSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!
contactError: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.

addressApp.title: Address Validation & Correction App
addressApp.desc1: Designed and developed an address validation and correction web application
addressApp.desc2: Integrated external APIs for address control and normalization
addressApp.desc3: Implemented geolocation features using Leaflet.js, OpenStreetMap and Google Maps
addressApp.desc4: Managed spatial data with PostgreSQL / PostGIS
addressApp.desc5: Developed a SOAP API with Spring Boot

svrAI.title: Estimate the Height of SVR-Lazartigue Using AI
svrAI.desc1: Developed a machine learning model to estimate the height of SVR-Lazartigue from satellite images
svrAI.desc2: Preprocessed and augmented a dataset of labeled images for training
svrAI.desc3: Implemented and fine-tuned a convolutional neural network (CNN) using TensorFlow
svrAI.desc4: Evaluated model performance and optimized hyperparameters to improve accuracy
svrAI.desc5: Collaborated with domain experts to validate results and ensure practical applicability

roquette.title: Environmental Website Design
roquette.desc1: Designed and developed an environmental website with Agence Roquette
roquette.desc2: Implemented responsive design using Timber and Twig templating
roquette.desc3: Customized WordPress themes to meet client requirements

websport.title: WebSport Application
websport.desc1: Developed a web application for sports training and management
websport.desc2: Implemented user authentication and authorization with Spring Security
websport.desc3: Built RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and PostgreSQL
websport.desc4: Created a responsive frontend with React and TypeScript

badminton.title: Badminton Training Application
badminton.desc1: Developed a badminton training application to help players improve their skills
badminton.desc2: Implemented features for training sessions and progress tracking
badminton.desc3: Designed a user-friendly interface using Vue.js and TailwindCSS
